name: Yuval Cohen
seeking: Yuval Cohen's UV Method seeks JV partners in the business coaching or personal transformation space who can integrate his methodology into their client offerings. He would benefit from co-facilitation relationships with executive coaches or entrepreneurs who deliver transformation programs needing a proprietary framework. Licensing or certification partnerships allowing other practitioners to teach the UV Method could scale his impact and revenue.
who_you_serve: Entrepreneurs and professionals seeking a structured methodology (the UV Method) for measurable personal or business transformation.
what_you_do: Develop and deliver the UV Method for business and personal transformation services.
offering: UV Method transformation program for business and personal development
business_focus: Develop and deliver the UV Method for business and personal transformation services.
